{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class HelloSayer[source]

HelloSayer(name)

Say hello to name using hello_name

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

hello_name[source]

hello_name(name)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

HelloSayer.say[source]

HelloSayer.say()

Do the saying

{% endraw %}

Example

{% raw %} 
hello_name('prat')

'hello prat'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
a = HelloSayer('Babe')
a.say()

'hello Babe'
{% endraw %}

Testing

{% raw %} 
assert hello_name('mayesha')=='hello mayesha'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
a = HelloSayer("Leo")
assert a.say()=='hello Leo'
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
